com.xtructure.xevolution.operator
Interface Operator<D>

Type Parameters:
D - type of data used by Genomes on which this operator is applied.
All Superinterfaces:
EvolutionObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
CrossoverOperator<D>, MutateOperator<D>, NEATOperator<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNEATOperator, AbstractOperator, AddLinkMutateOperator, AddNodeMutateOperator, AdjustAttributesMutateOperator, ArithmeticCrossoverOperator, ArithmeticCrossoverOperator, ArithmeticMutateOperator, ArithmeticMutateOperator, CopyCrossoverOperator, CopyMutateOperator, OperatorWorkbench.MutateOperatorAlias, RemoveLinkMutateOperator, StandardCrossoverOperator
public interface Operator<D>
extends EvolutionObject

The Operator interface describes the basic functionality of reproductive operations used in evolution. It defines Operator.OperationFailedException for use when operations fail in an expected way (e.g., removing a link when no links are present).

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
